item.title: Nintendo Announces Donkey Kong Bananza Direct For This Week
item.content:encoded:
https://gameinformer.com/2025/06/16/nintendo-announces-donkey-kong-bananza-direct-for-this-week

Nintendo has revealed it will hold a Direct this week focused on the upcoming Switch 2 exclusive, Donkey Kong Bananza. It revealed this in its news app, Nintendo Today, revealing the Donkey Kong Bananza Direct will air on Wednesday, June 18. 

The company says it will feature roughly 15 minutes of information about the game. The announcement doesn't include a start time for the Direct, but Game Informer will watch for that and update this story when it learns more. 

Donkey Kong Bananza launches exclusively on Switch 2 next month, on July 17. 

While waiting for this week's Direct, read up on the Donkey Kong Bananza reveal, and then read our hands-on preview thoughts on the game. After that, read about why Universal's Donkey Kong roller coaster is the best attraction in Super Nintendo World. 

Are you picking up Donkey Kong Bananza next month? Let us know in the comments below!
